content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 12 (APP): Pakistan Muslim League-Nawaz (PML-N) senior leader and head of the Senate parliamentary party, Senator Irfan Siddiqui, on Thursday strongly condemned Indiaas allegations against TA14rkiye and its recent actions targeting Turkish companies. During a meeting with Turkish Ambassador to Pakistan Irfan Neziroglu, Senator Siddiqui expressed solidarity with TA14rkiye, denouncing what he described as unjustified and politically motivated accusations. Senator Irfan Siddiqui said, aWe strongly reject Indiaas accusations against TA14rkiye and its measures against Turkish companies. While Pakistan desires peace in the region, we have made it clear to India that we will not accept its attempts at dominance and are fully prepared to respond decisively to any aggression.a Senator Irfan Siddiqui said that TA14rkiye stood by Pakistan as a true and steadfast friend during Indian aggression, and the nation will always remember this support. Pakistan-TA14rkiye friendship is reaching new heights, with growing opportunities for mutual cooperation, especially in security and defense, bringing the two nations even closer. Senator Irfan Siddiqui warmly welcomed the Turkish Ambassador to his office, noting that the strong friendship between President Tayyip Erdogan and Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif is playing a key role in deepening bilateral ties between Pakistan and TA14rkiye. Senator Irfan Siddiqui said, aWe strongly reject Indiaas accusations against TA14rkiye and its measures against Turkish companies. While Pakistan desires peace in the region, we have made it clear to India that we will not accept its attempts at dominance and are fully prepared to respond decisively to any aggression.a Senator Siddiqui said that Pakistan desires peace in the region but has made it clear to India that any attempt at dominance will not be accepted, and the country has the strength to respond firmly to any aggression. He emphasized that Pakistan is always ready for comprehensive and meaningful dialogue and noted that the world now clearly sees who is obstructing peace. He added that sustainable peace is not possible without resolving the core issue of Kashmir. They affirmed that TA14rkiye and Pakistan are inseparable. Both leaders expressed deep concern and strongly condemned Israelas genocide against the people of Gaza. They agreed on the importance of adopting a united stance at all international forums to uphold peace, justice, and human rights in the face of this oppression. Turkish Ambassador Dr. Irfan Neziroglu said that upon arriving in Pakistan, he never felt like he was in a different country, but rather in his own homeland. He added that TA14rkiye will continue to stand shoulder to shoulder with Pakistan in every challenging moment. The Turkish Ambassador emphasized that both countries should now take concrete, structured, and forward-looking steps to enhance mutual cooperation. The Turkish Ambassador, Dr. Irfan Neziroglu, praised Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharifas leadership, describing him as a deeply trusted and close friend of TA14rkiye. He noted that under Shehbaz Sharifas leadership, bilateral relations have grown stronger and are advancing on a solid foundation. He also reaffirmed TA14rkiyeas full support for Pakistanas principled stance on the Kashmir issue.
